alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Beaches; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 20 at 12:27PM PDT until March 22 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Most of Los Angeles, Ventura, Santa Barbara, and San Luis Obispo Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Beaches; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches
